basic.description: The goal of this individualized learning experience is to provide the      student the opportunity for an in-depth, philosophically-oriented ex-      ploration of concepts and principles relevant to medical ethics and public health policy. In particular, a major aim of this elective is for the student to appreciate the role that philosophical concepts(e.g. rights, justice,personhood, etc) play in analysis of cases and policies in medical ethics.
basic.subject: MDR
basic.title: Ethics in Medicine: Philosophical Foundations and Clinical Applications
